## Value type

Extract the values of an object as a union type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Value<GRecord> = GRecord[Key<GRecord>];
```

## Remarks


```ts
const myRecord = { A: 'a', B: 'b', C: 'c' } as const;

type MyRecord = Value<typeof myRecord>; // 'a' | 'b' | 'c'

```
